Cairo 7-2 (AFP) - announced parliamentary bloc, chairman of the Islamic Resistance Movement (HAMAS), Ismail Haniya that HAMAS who won the legislative elections in late January will offer an official Fatah movement led by Mahmoud Abbas to participate in the next government.
